page.title: 19Arts and Crafts at Uzmaston
page.content: Many country women join their local { {Women's Institute}to develop their chosen craft or crafts and others are introduced to crafts through compet- -ition and team efforts within the organisation. At a monthly meeting one may be sitting next to an{artist} who paints pictures of the locality or perhaps a keen bird watcher who{carves birds out of wood, and took a week's course in this subject at Denman College. A demonstration of{macrame} prompted several members to learn this ancient craft and one self taught member is now a demonstrator herself. Competition within the organisation demands a very high standard and in order to gain extra marks, courses in{ {smocking, tailoring, embroidery, patch {-work, upholstery, }and {knitting } have been undertaken by interested members.
